title: La Bombonera
summary: The Alberto J. Armando Stadium is a football stadium located in La Boca, Buenos Aires, Argentina. Widely known as La Bombonera (Spanish pronunciation: [la βomboˈneɾa]; English: The chocolate box[3]) due to its shape, with a "flat" stand on one side of the pitch and three steep stands round the rest of the stadium.[4][5][6]
